title: ARAM gave me 0 xp
body:
Just won an aram game but it legit gave me 0 xp.
i thought that its because its my 3rd aram game but that doesnt really explain it.
Any ideas ?

replies.body: Hey, which champion was this for?  ARAM should reward XP, unless you are marked as a leaver.

Had the same issue. 

(http://prntscr.com/h8f20i)

And if I dc but come back and finish the game, I am marked as a leaver and do not get xp?
Hey there, your Garen match yielded 153.  Your Ash match provided 80 XP.  It looks like the match history has a visual error not showing the amount of XP received.  Sorry for the confusion there.
